channel.description: Recent content in Html5 on Küse's Codes

item.title: Input file element with Bolero
item.description: Bolero is a set of free and open-source libraries and tools to write web applications in F#. With it, you can write fully dynamic client-side web applications from the comfort of a strongly-typed functional language, all with great performance.

item.title: WebSharper simple inputs
item.description:
This post shows various ways to handle input using WebSharper.

Client side

There are two basic approaches: using HTML templates or using Websharper’s HTML.
